title: Version 124.0.2478.97: May 10, 2024
text:
Version 124.0.2478.97: May 10, 2024 
Version 124.0.2478.97: May 10, 2024 
Important 
This update to Stable channel (and Extended Stable channel) contains a fix for  
CVE-2024-4671 
, which has been reported by the Chromium team as having an exploit in the wild. For more information, see the  
Security Update Guide 
. 
Stable channel security updates are listed  
here 
.
